description.description: The text that will accompany this repository in the Gitea UI

gitHub.description: If this repo is to sync from GitHub, information about the repo.

native.description: If this repo is to be created natively on Gitea, the information about the repo.

SerialisedGitHubRepo.description: Information about a repo that is being mirrored from GitHub.

SerialisedNativeRepo.description: Information about a repo that is to be created on Gitea without syncing from GitHub.

defaultBranch.description: The default branch name for this repository, e.g. 'main'

private.description: Whether this repository is a Gitea private repo

ignoreWhitespaceConflicts.description: either `true` to ignore whitespace for conflicts, or `false` to not ignore whitespace.

hasPullRequests.description: either `true` to allow pull requests, or `false` to prevent pull request.

hasProjects.description: either `true` to enable project unit, or `false` to disable them.

hasIssues.description: either `true` to enable issues for this repository or `false` to disable them.

hasWiki.description: either `true` to enable the wiki for this repository or `false` to disable it.

defaultMergeStyle.description: set to a merge style to be used by this repository: "merge", "rebase", "rebase-merge", or "squash".

deleteBranchAfterMerge.description: set to `true` to delete pr branch after merge by default.

allowSquashMerge.description: either `true` to allow squash-merging pull requests, or `false` to prevent squash-merging.

allowRebaseUpdate.description: either `true` to allow updating pull request branch by rebase, or `false` to prevent it.

allowRebase.description: either `true` to allow rebase-merging pull requests, or `false` to prevent rebase-merging.

allowRebaseExplicit.description: either `true` to allow rebase with explicit merge commits (--no-ff), or `false` to prevent rebase with explicit merge commits.

allowMergeCommits.description: either `true` to allow merging pull requests with a merge commit, or `false` to prevent merging pull requests with merge commits.

mirror.description: Configure a GitHub push mirror to sync this repo to

SerialisedPushMirror.description: Information about a repo that is to be created on Gitea without syncing from GitHub.

SerialisedProtectedBranch.description: Information about a repo that is to be created on Gitea without syncing from GitHub.
